name: Signal Triage
description: Monitor incoming signals, classify them by type and priority, route to appropriate layers or missions, and file structured triage reports.

outputs.description: New mission briefs spawned from high-priority signals.

permissions.justification: Must read signals and write triage outputs. No external system access required.
